plot: A village is evacuated and its population relocated to the edge of a large city. Biskov and his younger brother sell pigeons to the faithful on the marketplace.
title: Pera Berbangê
plot_es: A village is evacuated and its population relocated to the edge of a large city. Biskov and his younger brother sell pigeons to the faithful on the marketplace.
plot_en: A village is evacuated and its population relocated to the edge of a large city. Biskov and his younger brother sell pigeons to the faithful on the marketplace.
